name: Sails of Space - Prototype
description:
Presentation

This is a small prototype for a future and bigger game: Sails of Space, a space-steampunk universe with flying vessels.

Sails of Space

The final game will have three phases of gameplay: a land battle phase (in this prototype), a naval battle phase and a RPG phase with dialogues, choices and navigation on the galaxy map.

Notes

In this prototype, dialogues are temporarily in french.

You can download the prototype for Windows in the Download section.
